title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
xwiki-bridge - (00:06): [sdumitriu] Yes, there are about 3 spam users created each night  
xwiki-bridge - (00:06): [sdumitriu] I usually delete them  
xwiki-bridge - (00:09): [Lady Serena Kitty] D:  
xwiki-bridge - (00:24): [Lady Serena Kitty] is there a way to disable comments for an entire subwiki?  
xwiki-bridge - (00:25): [sdumitriu] Almost, using the global rights  
xwiki-bridge - (00:25): [Lady Serena Kitty] grrr  
xwiki-bridge - (00:25): [Lady Serena Kitty] okay  
xwiki-bridge - (00:26): [sdumitriu] But it's very hard to completely disable comments  
xwiki-bridge - (00:26): [sdumitriu] Since comments are object  
xwiki-bridge - (00:26): [Lady Serena Kitty] ya  
xwiki-bridge - (00:26): [sdumitriu] You'd have to write a listener that forbids adding objects of type XWiki.XWikiComments  
xwiki-bridge - (00:26): [sdumitriu] Oh, you can also disable the comments tab at the bottom of the page  
xwiki-bridge - (00:27): [Lady Serena Kitty] could one simply delete XWiki.XWikiComments from said subwiki?  
xwiki-bridge - (00:27): [sdumitriu] There was a FAQ entry about it  
xwiki-bridge - (00:27): [sdumitriu] No, I think it's created automatically in the core  
xwiki-bridge - (00:29): [Lady Serena Kitty] hmm  
xwiki-bridge - (00:35): [sdumitriu] K, spam deleted  
xwiki-bridge - (00:35): [Lady Serena Kitty] :D  
rrodriguez\_ joined #xwiki at 01:07  
xwiki-bridge - (01:17): [sdumitriu] Jérôme Velociter: Still working?  
rrodriguez left at 01:17 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)  
rrodriguez\_ is now known as rrodriguez ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
xwiki-bridge - (01:20): [Lady Serena Kitty] how does one programatically get the URL for an attachment in velocity code?  
xwiki-bridge - (01:22): [sdumitriu] http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/DevGuide/API/xwiki-core-2.1.1-javadoc.jar/com/xpn/xwiki/api/Document.html#getAttachmentURL%28java.lang.String%29  
xwiki-bridge - (01:22): [sdumitriu] Or http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/DevGuide/API/xwiki-core-2.1.1-javadoc.jar/com/xpn/xwiki/api/XWiki.html#getAttachmentURL%28java.lang.String,%20java.lang.String%29  
xwiki-bridge - (01:23): [Lady Serena Kitty] ah, so $doc.getAttachmentURL("image.png")  
xwiki-bridge - (01:23): [Lady Serena Kitty] hmm  
xwiki-bridge - (01:23): \*\*\* Lady Serena Kitty hugs sdumitriu  
xwiki-bridge - (01:28): [Lady Serena Kitty] and I can also use something like $doc.getAttachmentURL("[[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)"), correct?  
xwiki-bridge - (01:35): [Lady Serena Kitty] friend and I are building a software forge thing inside XWiki  
xwiki-bridge - (01:35): [Lady Serena Kitty] would this be one of those things that XWiki was never intended for but manages to pull off nicely?  
xwiki-bridge - (01:36): [sdumitriu] Yep  
xwiki-bridge - (01:36): [Lady Serena Kitty] :D  
xwiki-bridge - (01:37): [sdumitriu] We're also doing a very small forge on the code zone  
xwiki-bridge - (01:37): [sdumitriu] code.xwiki.org  
xwiki-bridge - (01:37): [sdumitriu] And the new contrib  
xwiki-bridge - (01:37): [sdumitriu] http://contrib.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  
xwiki-bridge - (01:37): [Lady Serena Kitty] ah, ours is going to be more similar to SourceForge  
xwiki-bridge - (01:38): [sdumitriu] re getAttachmentURL('[[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)')  
xwiki-bridge - (01:38): [sdumitriu] What's that supposed to be?  
xwiki-bridge - (01:38): [Lady Serena Kitty] something like getting an attachment URL for an attachment on another page  
xwiki-bridge - (01:39): [sdumitriu] You can use $xwiki.getAttachmentURL('XWiki.DefaultSkin', 'image.png')  
xwiki-bridge - (01:39): [Lady Serena Kitty] oh  
xwiki-bridge - (01:39): [sdumitriu] Or $xwiki.getSkinFile('image.png')  
xwiki-bridge - (02:21): [Lady Serena Kitty] we have decided that every registered project in our forge will be given their own Space  
xwiki-bridge - (02:22): [Lady Serena Kitty] so I guess I need to write a script that can create (register) a project space and delete (unregister) a project space  
rrodriguez\_ joined #xwiki at 03:07  
rrodriguez left at 03:18 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)  
rrodriguez\_ is now known as rrodriguez ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
xwiki-bridge - (03:34): \* sdumitriu has set the subject to: XWiki Chat - http://www.xwiki.org/  
xwiki-bridge - (04:21): [Lady Serena Kitty] ;\_;  
xwiki-bridge - (04:21): [Lady Serena Kitty] "Wiki "oxygenforge" creation failed: Error number 50035 in 5: com.xpn.xwiki.plugin.wikimanager.WikiManagerPlugin: Wiki oxygenforge <applewebdata://074E9360-7D1F-40A0-AEB3-4B87319CDC45/bin/edit/WikiManager/oxygenforge?parent=WikiManager.CreateNewWiki>? database update failed Wrapped Exception: Error number 3202 in 3: Exception while reading document XWiki.XWikiPreferences Wrapped Exception: could not  
xwiki-bridge - (04:21): [Lady Serena Kitty] an entity: xpn.xwiki.doc.XWiki Document <applewebdata://074E9360-7D1F-40A0-AEB3-4B87319CDC45/bin/edit/com.xpn.xwiki.doc/XWikiDocument?parent=WikiManager.CreateNewWiki>?."  
xwiki-bridge - (04:39): [Lady Serena Kitty] AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!  
xwiki-bridge - (04:39): [Lady Serena Kitty] it couldn't create new wikis because I had changed the stuffs after the ? in the database connection query  
xwiki-bridge - (04:40): [Lady Serena Kitty] I reverted back to the default database query (but still modified for my setup) and then the wiki creation worked perfectly  
xwiki-bridge - (04:40): [Lady Serena Kitty] now THAT's funny

xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR] dear friend.....  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]   
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]   
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                      "HAPPY NEW YEAR  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                  Fresh Air....  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                   Fresh Idea....  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                  Fresh Talent....  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                   Fresh Energy....  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]           I wish U to have a .....  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                  Sweetest Sunday,  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]               Marvellous Monday,  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]                  Tasty Tuesday,  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]           Wonderful Wednesday,  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]              Thankful Thursday,  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]             Friendly Friday,  
xwiki-bridge - (06:22): [SURYA SAGAR]           Successful  
xwiki-bridge - (06:41): [Lady Serena Kitty] wow, I found a showstopper of a bug  
xwiki-bridge - (06:42): \*\*\* Lady Serena Kitty prances off to report it

lucaa joined #xwiki at 13:41  
lucaa left #xwiki at 13:41  
CalebJamesDeLisl joined #xwiki at 18:43  
xwiki-bridge - (18:44): [sdumitriu] Hey Caleb  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:46): Hi  
xwiki-bridge - (18:46): [sdumitriu] Are you familiar with KDE?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:47): Yes, but I am using Gnome  
xwiki-bridge - (18:47): [sdumitriu] Maybe you can help me  
xwiki-bridge - (18:47): [sdumitriu] I'm logged in as User1  
xwiki-bridge - (18:47): [sdumitriu] In konsole, I su as User2  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:47): What is your distribution?  
xwiki-bridge - (18:47): [sdumitriu] Gentoo  
xwiki-bridge - (18:48): [sdumitriu] User1 can open QT and GTK and any other type of applications  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:48): Yes...  
xwiki-bridge - (18:48): [sdumitriu] User2 can open GTK and X applications, but any QT application fails to show up  
xwiki-bridge - (18:48): [sdumitriu] No error message  
xwiki-bridge - (18:48): [sdumitriu] Just no GUI  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:49): Do they have similar permissions?  
xwiki-bridge - (18:49): [sdumitriu] Maybe this can help:  
xwiki-bridge - (18:49): [sdumitriu]   
xwiki-bridge - (18:49): [sdumitriu] /usr/bin/notify-send -t 1500 -u low "Some message"  
xwiki-bridge - (18:49): [sdumitriu] libnotify-Message: Unable to get session bus: Did not receive a reply. Possible causes include: the remote application did not send a reply, the message bus security policy blocked the reply, the reply timeout expired, or the network connection was broken.  
xwiki-bridge - (18:49): [sdumitriu] I don't know if permissions apply, since GTK windows show up fine  
xwiki-bridge - (18:50): [sdumitriu] If you don't know a quick answer, don't bother, I'll continue searching for an answer  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:51): My thinking is eliminate possibilities. I don't know a quick answer, but I would look for known bugs in QT which relate to a user taking control from all others.  
xwiki-bridge - (18:52): [sdumitriu] Yes, it's a KDE security feature, but I have no idea how to configure it  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:52): Good luck, Sorry I couldn't help.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:53): Did you see my mail about getting XWikiServlet and Action working?  
xwiki-bridge - (18:54): [sdumitriu] In Re: [xwiki-devs] Introduce new tempresource action  
xwiki-bridge - (18:54): [sdumitriu] ?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:54): Yes, since 90% of the code is already written it seems like it should be set up to work.  
xwiki-bridge - (18:54): [sdumitriu] Yep  
xwiki-bridge - (18:54): [sdumitriu] It's a good idea  
xwiki-bridge - (18:55): [sdumitriu] But I don't know if a direct commit is good  
xwiki-bridge - (18:55): [sdumitriu] A git branch would be nice...  
xwiki-bridge - (18:55): [sdumitriu] You could start with a patch on Jira\  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:55): I will need some consensus about what the url should be. Something like /x/ instead of /bin/  
xwiki-bridge - (18:55): [sdumitriu] For review  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:56): I like review :)  
xwiki-bridge - (18:56): [sdumitriu] Heh, a good idea would be to map it to /  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:56): Would that not mess up all of the other stuff eg: bin action confused with legacy struts?  
xwiki-bridge - (18:57): [sdumitriu] Normally it should work  
xwiki-bridge - (18:57): [sdumitriu] Since /bin is configured, it takes precedence over / + bin  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:58): So a bin action would simply not work?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:59): And I'm guessing the /\* mapping would be the last mapping in the web.xml  
xwiki-bridge - (18:59): [sdumitriu] Or the first?  
xwiki-bridge - (18:59): [sdumitriu] Yes, other servlet mappings will be forbidden as action names  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (19:00): Another issue is that I had to set up an initializer to take the URL string and make an XWikiURL but the regex xwiki url generator is a bit fragile.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (19:02): Mainly, it won't accept ip addresses.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (19:03): No big deal, it just needs some work.  
xwiki-bridge - (19:08): [sdumitriu] Finally, KDE issue solved  
xwiki-bridge - (19:08): [sdumitriu] FYI, in case you have the same problem, use "su - User2" instead of "su User2"  
xwiki-bridge - (19:09): [sdumitriu] http://linux-wizard.net/blog-why\_starting\_a\_kde\_application\_with\_just\_su\_failed-290.html

SvenDowiu left at 22:05 (Network is unreachable  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (22:26): Vincent, What is inserting actions before other actions?  
xwiki-bridge - (22:26): [Vincent Massol] Caleb: just the ability to insert some actions before another one in case its needed. For example a user might want to do something just before the default save action is executed  
xwiki-bridge - (22:27): [Vincent Massol] s/user/developer/  
xwiki-bridge - (22:27): [sdumitriu] I think that Vincent has a different definition for the Action than what's currently in the core  
xwiki-bridge - (22:27): [Vincent Massol] I'm talking about xwiki-action indeed  
xwiki-bridge - (22:27): [sdumitriu] More like "processing step"  
xwiki-bridge - (22:27): [Vincent Massol] http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/core/trunk/xwiki-action/  
xwiki-bridge - (22:28): [Vincent Massol] the design for this module is not over yet so it needs to be firmed u  
xwiki-bridge - (22:28): [Vincent Massol] up  
xwiki-bridge - (22:28): [Vincent Massol] the use cases need to be defined more properly to ensure it's able to answer them all  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (22:28): inserting before, such as /cache/gzip/view/etc. ?  
xwiki-bridge - (22:28): [Vincent Massol] (in case you want to work on this caleb)  
xwiki-bridge - (22:29): [Vincent Massol] whatever  
xwiki-bridge - (22:29): [Vincent Massol] you might want to save in svn for example  
xwiki-bridge - (22:29): [sdumitriu] check captcha  
xwiki-bridge - (22:29): [Vincent Massol] (svn save might be after actually - maybe bad example :))  
xwiki-bridge - (22:29): [Vincent Massol] anyway it's like an aspect  
xwiki-bridge - (22:30): [Vincent Massol] an aspect has before(), after() and around()  
xwiki-bridge - (22:30): [Lady Serena Kitty] and I still can't seem to remove the /bin/ on my wikis  
xwiki-bridge - (22:30): [Vincent Massol] got to go  
xwiki-bridge - (22:30): [Vincent Massol] bfn  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (22:30): Thanks.
